explanation: [0-0] In a yellow room, on a table in the front, there is a transparent cup filled with yellow liquid. On top of the cup is a stack of cards. A woman wearing a white hoodie puffs up her cheeks, preparing to blow the stack of cards. A boy wearing a black hoodie on the right side smiles and looks at her. The wall behind them is covered with crisscrossed wooden blocks, with a string of colorful flags hanging on it.

[0-2] After blowing off some cards, the woman in white stands up and walks to the left. The boy in black on the right comes to the table and does the same, blowing some cards onto the table. At this time, a woman in a red top appears on the right, looking at the man in front. After the man stands up, the woman gradually walks to the left.
